enhanced_description: Ascent HR provides a powerful and flexible 'People Practice' platform, offering customized HR solutions through a hybrid framework of SaaS-based technology and tightly integrated managed services. Their comprehensive suite includes HR automation, payroll processing, benefits administration, and robust HR compliance management, all designed to strengthen business infrastructure, streamline processes, and enhance competitive advantage. Ascent HR also offers expert HR consulting services and scalable solutions built to grow with evolving business needs, supporting companies across various sizes and international operations.
